author: agemanning
content: FYI: We are shifting our gossipsub validation to reject messages that have either a `from`, `seqno` or `signature` field. I'm under the impression now that all clients are not sending these fields.

author: agemanning
content:
There's lots of messages out there that have non-empty seqno and signatures. It's hard to identify the source, because all peers currently propagate it. 

I guess these are all about to be filtered tho so, it will become evident soon.
